meanings.definition: A person devoted to luxury and pleasure.
meanings.sent1: The sybarites in the fancy restaurant ordered the most expensive dishes.
meanings.sent2: Sybarites enjoy indulging in lavish vacations and extravagant shopping sprees.
meanings.sent3: The group of sybarites decided to have a spa day to relax in luxury.
meanings.sent4: The sybarites lived in a world of opulence and excess, surrounded by wealth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The sybarites' luxurious lifestyle was the envy of all their friends.

meanings.sent1: At the party, the sybarites mingled with the elite crowd.
meanings.sent2: The sybarites traveled in style, staying at the most exclusive resorts.
meanings.sent3: The sybarites' collection of designer clothes filled their walk-in closets.
meanings.sent4: Among the sybarites, only the finest wines were served at their gatherings.
meanings.sent5: The sybarites' taste for luxury knew no bounds, always seeking the most extravagant experiences.
